ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately recovers 2 Technique Points for your team, but each team member loses HP equal to <unbreak>15%</unbreak> of their Max HP.
ItemBGDesc: An incredibly popular milk tea in Luofu. It is visually appealing but tastes surprisingly rough and unpalatable. "I really don't understand why this thing is so popular..." "Maybe they had good marketing... I heard they hired a marketing specialist from the IPC."
